titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR IN SITU HYBRIDISATION RECEPTOR STATUS (BREAST) - Description

body.p: HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR IN SITU HYBRIDISATION RECEPTOR STATUS (BREAST) is the same as attribute HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR IN SITU HYBRIDISATION RECEPTOR STATUS FOR BREAST .

Note: HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR IN SITU HYBRIDISATION RECEPTOR STATUS (BREAST) is only required if the initial HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR RECEPTOR STATUS (BREAST) is National Code 'Borderline (2+)' .
